name: One Last Time
description:
Life can change in an instant, sometimes in the wrong way. After losing someone close, a mysteriously familiar person shows up to help you get your life back together. Overcome the stages of grief in this intriguing puzzle-centric, dialogue experience and see how the story unfolds.

A short and sweet, solo developed indie game full of memorable conversations and simple, yet fun, puzzles.

Features

  • A compelling story told through the conversations between two people.
  • 50 relaxing, grid-based puzzles.
  • Different outfits to express themselves with.
  • Additional side story.
  • Soothing backgrounds and calm music.
  • Beautifully minimalistic art style.
